item.title: Renewable Energy and Community Resilience: Building a Climate-Ready Future
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
One of the greatest problems of our day is climate change, which has the potential to affect every area of our lives such as Increasing the frequency and severity of natural disasters like hurricanes, floods, and wildfires; These by all means are some of climate change’s most severe effects. These catastrophes can be disastrous, including...

The post Renewable Energy and Community Resilience: Building a Climate-Ready Future appeared first on The New Vibes.
